title: Texas man is found guilty in first jury trial over Capitol riot and now faces up to 60 years in prison - The Independent
content:
1. Texas man is found guilty in first jury trial over Capitol riot and now faces up to 60 years in prison  The Independent
  2. Wylie man found guilty on all counts for his role in the January 6th Capitol riot  WFAA
  3. Guy Wesley Reffitt Is Convicted in First Jan. 6 Trial  The New York Times
  4. Jury finds first US Capitol riot defendant to go on trial guilty on all counts  CNN
  5. Analysis: U.S. can expect 'a flood of plea deals' in Capitol attack cases after guilty verdict  Reuters.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Guy Reffitt was a member of ‘Three Percenters’, a militia group named after American colonists who defeated the British during the Revolutionary War.
